channel.title: Strength
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Strength" - I'm a Jounin and I don;t understand what strength does....

item.title: Re: Strength
item.content:encoded: Strength is added to what you roll on missions, though it still can't go above your range. So if you have a Range of 12 (because you're a Jonin) and a Strength of 3, you can roll 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 12, 12, and 12 because you can't go above 12.

item.title: Strength
item.content:encoded: Can anyone explain how strength benefits you and how it helps you, whether it helps you in a specific way or genreally….
